thread.title: CCTV video shows moment man is shot dead over a cellphone
thread.title_full: CCTV video shows moment man is shot dead over a cellphone

title: CCTV video shows moment man is shot dead over a cellphone
text: The shocking moment a man is shot dead during an argument over a CELL PHONE WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT De'Andre Malik Thomas, 20, has been charged with murder in connection with the Thursday shooting death of Kareem Mano, 25 Police say the two men had argued about a cellphone Thomas allegedly sold to the sister of Mano's girlfriend Thomas and Mano agreed to meet to discuss the issue when incident escalated to Mano's fatal shooting Surveillance camera outside of USA Grocery Store recorded deadly shooting Police say at time of shooting, Thomas was already out on a $65,000 bond pending a trial in connection with a robbery last April Published: 21:32 GMT, 26 February 2017 | Updated: 08:34 GMT, 27 February 2017 366 shares
